name: False Rebirth: Enhanced Edition
description:
False Rebirth:

This is a psychological, story-focused game about the last remaining human, and his search for meaning in a post-apocalyptic world.

This is the Enhanced Edition of the game, with updated graphics, an extra ending, bug fixes, and overall performance improvement.

Features:
  • Thought-provoking story & dialogues.
  • Detailed graphics with emphasis on visual storytelling.
  • 6 Endings: 1 true ending and 5 false endings.
  • Certain Graphical & Narrative Randomizations whenever you start a new game.
  • An autosave feature. (No manual saving.) 
Details:
  • Title: False Rebirth Enhanced Edition
  • Playtime: 45 min - 2 hrs
  • Genre: Narrative driven, Psychological.
  • Game Engine: RPG Maker MZ 
  • Play Mechanic: You walk (& run) from one place to the next, interact, have dialogue, make choices, and progress through the story. (There is no battle system.)
System Requirements:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 (or equivalent)
  • Directx: Version 11
  • Processor: 64-bit OS, Intel i5, Quad core (or equivalent).
  • Storage: 420 MB of available space
  • Controls Support: Keyboard, Mouse, or Gamepad. (Everything works. However,  the game and instructions were made with keyboard as focus.)
Notes:

  • The game still has a few bugs. But none of them are game breaking. (If you encounter any game-breaking bug, please do let me know!)
  • After you're done playing, be sure to comment, give your honest review, and rate the game however you feel!
  • And you are free to make a let's play/walkthrough/gameplay video of this game as well.
